Path2D.summary: The Path2D interface of the Canvas 2D API is used to declare a path that can then be used on a object. The path methods of the CanvasRenderingContext2D interface are also present on this interface, which gives you the convenience of being able to retain and replay your path whenever desired.

Path2DPath2D.summary:
The Path2D() constructor returns a newly instantiated
Path2D object, optionally with another path as an argument (creates a
copy), or optionally with a string consisting of SVG path data.

remarks.para: -, the interface this constructor belongs to

Path2DAddPath.summary:
The Path2D.addPath() method
of the Canvas 2D API adds one object to another
Path2D object.
